title: RECRUITING FOR NEW RANKED 5 TEAM
body:
Hi guys, 
Created a New ranked Team needs members for these roles:

Jng:

ADC: Vatia
Sup:

Gold +

Active at least 3 days a week (inc weekends)
NOT BE A DICK
Accept Constructive criticism

Leave App as:
IGN:
RANK:
ROLE:
CHAMPS:
